name: analyze_vetted_codebase
description: Analyze the Vetted codebase to understand implementation patterns, find related code, or get architectural context for making changes.

query.description: A natural language question about the codebase, feature, or implementation.

items.description: A directory path to limit search scope.

target_directories.description: Optional array of directory paths to limit search scope.

name: implement_vetted_feature
description: Implement a new feature or complete an incomplete implementation in the Vetted platform. Ensures code follows existing patterns, includes error handling, and is production-ready.

feature.description: Description of the feature to implement.

items.description: A file path that needs to be created or modified.

files.description: Array of file paths that need to be created or modified.

name: get_vetted_project_status
description: Get the current status of the Vetted project including implemented features, pending enhancements, and technical debt. Useful for understanding what's done and what needs work.

scope.description: What aspect of the project to analyze: 'features', 'infrastructure', 'extensions', 'all'.

name: evaluate_technology_for_vetted
description: Evaluate a new technology, framework, or tool for potential use in the Vetted platform. Provides analysis of benefits, trade-offs, implementation complexity, and recommendations.

technology.description: Name of the technology, framework, or tool to evaluate.

use_case.description: The specific use case or problem this technology would solve in Vetted.

current_solution.description: What Vetted currently uses for this use case, if applicable.

name: debug_vetted_issue
description: Debug an issue or error in the Vetted platform. Analyzes error messages, traces code paths, identifies root causes, and proposes fixes.

error_description.description: Description of the error or issue, including error messages, stack traces, or symptoms.

items.description: A component, file, or feature that is affected.

affected_components.description: Optional array of components, files, or features that are affected.

name: refactor_vetted_code
description: Refactor code in the Vetted platform to improve maintainability, performance, or follow best practices. Ensures functionality is preserved while improving code quality.

target.description: What to refactor: file path, component name, or feature name.

goal.description: The goal of the refactoring: 'performance', 'maintainability', 'readability', 'patterns', or 'optimization'.
